/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a bridge, providing a panoramic view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street below is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The perspective of the image is from the left side of the street, looking towards the right, giving a sense of depth and dimension to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image is a beautiful representation of urban life in Beijing, capturing the essence of the city in a single frame.
